entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:35 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:35 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:35 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
